sentences.en: A timeless comic actor—his simplicity and his apparent ease are matchless.
sentences.cn: 作为喜剧界的常青树——他的简单淳朴与自然大方无人能及。

sentences.en: Breathe out and ease your knees in toward your chest.
sentences.cn: 呼气，膝部放松向胸部靠拢。

sentences.en: Every facility was laid on to ease their homecoming.
sentences.cn: 动用了一切设施以缓解他们的回乡之困。

sentences.en: He did whatever he could to ease their travail.
sentences.cn: 他为减轻他们的辛劳做了力所能及的一切。

sentences.en: He fell asleep just past midnight with tolerable ease.
sentences.cn: 他刚过午夜就睡着了，睡得还算安稳。

sentences.en: He gently opened the throttle, and the ship began to ease forward.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻松开油门杆，轮船开始缓缓前行。

sentences.en: He had romped through the maze of questions with unexpected ease.
sentences.cn: 想不到他不费吹灰之力很快就解决了那些错综复杂的问题。

sentences.en: He's prone to flit between subjects with amazing ease.
sentences.cn: 他往往会轻松自如地转换话题。

sentences.en: Her breathing had eased.
sentences.cn: 她的呼吸平缓下来。

sentences.en: It is a cancer that can be cured with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 这是一种相对来说比较容易治疗的癌症。

sentences.en: It is essential to feel at ease with your therapist.
sentences.cn: 在治疗师面前放松下来是很重要的。

sentences.en: measures to ease congestion in the city
sentences.cn: 改善城市拥堵状况的措施

sentences.en: put the soldiers at ease while waiting for inspection.
sentences.cn: 等待检阅时让士兵们稍息

sentences.en: Reduced interest rates would help ease recessionary pressures in the economy.
sentences.cn: 利率的下调将有助于缓解经济衰退的压力。

sentences.en: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.cn: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.en: she was never quite &B{at ease with} Phil.
sentences.cn: 她与菲尔在一起总感到不自在。

sentences.en: The agreement will ease the way for other countries to join the EU.
sentences.cn: 该协议将为其他国家加入欧盟扫除障碍。

sentences.en: The person can transfer from wheelchair to seat with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 那个人可以比较轻松地从轮椅上移到座位上。

sentences.en: The plan should ease traffic congestion in the town.
sentences.cn: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

sentences.en: The sea started to ease as we came under Cuba's lee.
sentences.cn: 我们靠近古巴的背风海岸时风浪开始平息。

sentences.en: They agreed to work co-operatively to ease tensions wherever possible.
sentences.cn: 他们同意互相配合尽一切努力缓解紧张局势。

sentences.en: They sprawl at ease across the sofa, arms draped over the back.
sentences.cn: 他们惬意地躺在沙发上，胳膊搭在后面。

sentences.en: They won with ease.
sentences.cn: 他们轻松获胜。

sentences.en: You always look ill at ease in a suit.
sentences.cn: 你穿套装看上去总有些不自在。

words.tran_cn: 减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动

phrases.tran_cn: 安适；不窘迫，不拘束；放松，自然
稍息：用于让队伍呈放松姿势的口令
回软；售后回租；轻轻拉回
◎自我安慰，泄愤，出气；抛弃心头的烦闷
缓和紧张状况；缓和紧张局势
感到心安理得；感到轻松
不畅快；局促不安；心神不宁

trans.tran_en: Ease is the state of being very comfortable and able to live as you want, without any worries or problems

trans.tran_cn: 减轻，缓和，（使）小心缓缓地移动，降低，（使）贬值
trans.tran_en: if something unpleasant eases, or if you ease it, it gradually improves or becomes less

trans.tran_cn: 减轻，放松，小心移置；舒适
trans.tran_en: feeling relaxed, especially in a situation in which people might feel a little nervous
to make a process happen more easily
